sentences.sContent: The whole family was sitting around the dinner table.
The Romans built a defensive wall around the city.
sentences.sCn: 罗马人在城市周围筑起一道防御墙。

sentences.sContent: ...I was a student – or sitting around at home very much...

...My ancestor was the preacher traveling around countryside...

...France is the first country to kick around the idea of paving its roads with solar panels...
...if a robot does chores around the house...
...The manager told me that Jack Green's been very active around the shop the last few days...
...It’s great because we play cards or just sit around and talk when there are no customers...

phrases.pCn: 四处走动；供应；（消息）流传

trans.tranOther: surrounding or on all sides of something or someone
